title: How to Use App
text:
-Fill in the text fields for Title and Note

-Once both fields have text a save button appears in upper right

-Click save and note will be added to saved notes

-Click saved notes to view the contents

-If viewing existing note, can push + sign to start new note

*Notes will be saved even when app is closed

**Notes will persist and be viewable by ANY user
           -please be appropriate, family friends notes only


                                 Thanks  & Enjoy!

                                                   -Brad Schill
